#summary The mailer module of metaqc

= Introduction =

This module creates and sends the email reports.

= Process =

  * Mail settings are read from the configuration file
  * Presence of required files (logos, styles) verified
  * Report file scanned for test failures
  * Any failures are appended to the message body (if requested in config)
  * Placeholder text (such as current date) is formatted
  * PDF report is created (by `pdflatex`) and attached
  * Email sent to recipients
  * Clean up is peformed (removing log files, etc)
